_joint_reference.J1: Base rotation: + = rotate LEFT, - = rotate RIGHT
_joint_reference.J2: Shoulder: + = upper arm tilts FORWARD/DOWN, - = upper arm tilts BACKWARD/UP
_joint_reference.J3: Elbow: + = forearm folds IN, - = forearm extends OUT
_joint_reference.J4: Forearm rotation: + = rotate LEFT, - = rotate RIGHT
_joint_reference.J5: Wrist tilt: + = gripper tilts DOWN, - = gripper tilts UP
_joint_reference.J6: Gripper rotation: + = rotate one way, - = rotate other way
